languages.text: В ожидании, пока корабль снова сможет отправиться в путь, Вольный Торговец вол{mf|ен|ьна} посетить местную администрацию. Наместник Владайм ожидает в своей резиденции.
While waiting for the ship to be ready to get underway again, the Rogue Trader is free to visit the local administration. Liege Tocara is waiting in his residence.
languages.original_text: В ожидании, пока корабль снова сможет отправиться в путь, Вольный Торговец вол{mf|ен|ьна} посетить местную администрацию. Наместник Владайм ожидает в своей резиденции.

traits.locale_text: While waiting for the ship to be ready to get underway again, the Rogue Trader is free to visit the local administration. Liege Tocara is waiting in his residence.
While waiting for the ship to be ready to get underway again, the Rogue Trader is free to visit the local administration. Liege Tocara is waiting in his residence.
While waiting for the ship to be ready to get underway again, the Rogue Trader is free to visit the local administration. Liege Tocara is waiting in his residence.
While waiting for the ship to be ready to get underway again, the Rogue Trader is free to visit the local administration. Liege Tocara is waiting in his residence.

languages.text: 在等待飞船维修的这段期间，行商浪人可以自由造访当地的行政部门。托卡拉总督正在他的宅邸中等待行商浪人来访。
languages.original_text: While waiting for the ship to be ready to get underway again, the Rogue Trader is free to visit the local administration. Liege Tocara is waiting in his residence.

traits.locale_text: 在等待飞船维修的这段期间，行商浪人可以自由造访当地的行政部门。托卡拉总督正在他的宅邸中等待行商浪人来访。

languages.text: 航行の準備が整うまでの間、自由開拓者はにこの地の政府を好きに訪問できる。領主トカラは邸宅で待っている。
languages.original_text: While waiting for the ship to be ready to get underway again, the Rogue Trader is free to visit the local administration. Liege Tocara is waiting in his residence.

traits.locale_text: 航行の準備が整うまでの間、自由開拓者はにこの地の政府を好きに訪問できる。領主トカラは邸宅で待っている。

languages.text: Mientras esperas a que la nave esté lista para viajar de nuevo, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente puede aprovechar para visitar la administración local. El señor Tocara espera en su residencia.
languages.original_text: While waiting for the ship to be ready to get underway again, the Rogue Trader is free to visit the local administration. Liege Tocara is waiting in his residence.

traits.locale_text: Mientras esperas a que la nave esté lista para viajar de nuevo, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente puede aprovechar para visitar la administración local. El señor Tocara espera en su residencia.

languages.text: Während die Reparaturen des Schiffes andauern, kann sich {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} mit der örtlichen Verwaltung befassen. Lehnsherr Tocara wartet in seiner Residenz.
languages.original_text: While waiting for the ship to be ready to get underway again, the Rogue Trader is free to visit the local administration. Liege Tocara is waiting in his residence.

traits.locale_text: Während die Reparaturen des Schiffes andauern, kann sich {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} mit der örtlichen Verwaltung befassen. Lehnsherr Tocara wartet in seiner Residenz.

languages.text: En attendant que le vaisseau soit à nouveau opérationnel, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a la possibilité de rendre visite à l'administration locale. Le suzerain Tocara attend dans sa résidence.
languages.original_text: While waiting for the ship to be ready to get underway again, the Rogue Trader is free to visit the local administration. Liege Tocara is waiting in his residence.

traits.locale_text: En attendant que le vaisseau soit à nouveau opérationnel, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a la possibilité de rendre visite à l'administration locale. Le suzerain Tocara attend dans sa résidence.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, geminin yeniden yola koyulabilecek duruma gelmesini beklerken yerel yönetimi ziyaret edebilir. Emîr Tocara, konağında bekliyor.
languages.original_text: While waiting for the ship to be ready to get underway again, the Rogue Trader is free to visit the local administration. Liege Tocara is waiting in his residence.

traits.locale_text: Geminin yeniden yola koyulabilecek duruma gelmesini beklerken Hür Tacir yerel yönetimi ziyaret edebilir. Emîr Tocara konağında bekliyor.
